interface.help: Contiene el identificador del registro creado para enviarse.
interface.name: id_interaction

mapper.command:
SELECT
  sc.*,
  pc.address AS person_address,
  ch.id_channel_provider,
  ch.name AS channel_name,
  ch.address AS channel_address,
i.id AS id_interaction,
i.text AS text,
i.status AS status
FROM public.system_conversation sc
JOIN public.person_conversation pc
  ON pc.id_conversation = sc.id_conversation
JOIN public.channels ch
  ON ch.id = sc.id_channel

JOIN public.interactions i
ON i.id_system_conversation=sc.id

WHERE i.status = 'pending_delivery' AND i.id={{23.id_interaction}}
ORDER BY i.time_stamp ASC

mapper.command:
SELECT id_channel_provider, name, address FROM public.channels
WHERE channels.id={{2.id_channel}}
